title: Bricks and Chicks?
author: verias
text:
So, after some brief discussion, J and I both thought this was a fun idea. Seeing who was behind the scenes of the Bricks of the Arcana strips. I definitely thought it was cute.

We plan to bring you more story very soon. Thanks for sticking with us!

replies.author: Adamas*Guest*
replies.text: Yeah...I can see that and for some reason hear her giggling the whole time.
